name: Robotframework-debugui
tagline: A simple to use debug tool for robotFramework scripting. Allows user to interactively try script commands.
body:
### Welcome to robotFramework-DebugUI.
This is a quick and simple way to debug and develop robotFramework scripts. 

### Rapid debugging
Add the word 'Debug' in your script and the debugger panel pops up. This lists available commands and lets you quickly try  them interactively. 

### Simple to use
Add this line to your script settings:  

    *** Settings ***
    Library   DebugUI

Insert the word "Debug" before the line you want to test. Run the script and the debugger panel pops up. It lists available commands and lets you try them interactively. A simple example :

    *** Test Cases ***
    Test DebugUI
        Open browser    http://www.ucas.ac.uk    Chrome
        debug

When you are happy with the commands simply paste them into your script. 
You can use the debugger to develop new scripts or rapidly fix breakages in existing scripts. 
You can also view robotFramework variables and use other tools like firebug and checkXpath while debugging. 

### Authors and Contributors
Thanks to UCAS at Cheltenham, England for supporting development and sharing of DebugUI. All blame for bad code attaches to @jCliveStewart

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at https://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
